name: Root Veg Roll
description:
Play as a root vegetable as you roll your way through a kitchen full of obstacle courses, and make your way to the finish to complete the level!

This was made for Global Game Jam 2023 at UWE Bristol in 48 hours!

Controls:

WASD / Left Stick - Move

Mouse / Right Stick - Look

Escape / Start - Pause

R / Back - Restart Level

Credits:

Oli Hewison - Code

Dillon Waugh - Art

Miya Ahmed - Music
